result.arabic_text: وَأَنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تُلۡقُواْ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلتَّهۡلُكَةِ وَأَحۡسِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
result.translation: Spend in the way of Allah[94] and do not throw yourselves into destruction[95], and do good, for Allah loves those who do good.
result.footnotes: [94] Raise funds to prepare for a just fight. [95] By not making preparations.
